typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT as date,
		ID_TIPUS_EXPEDIENT as string,
		COD_LLENGUA as string,
		COD_PROP_EXPE as string,
		DATA_PRESCRIPCIO_EXPEDIENT as date,
		DATA_ARXIU as date,
		COD_ARXIU as string,
		DATA_SANCIO_FERME as date,
		IND_IMPORT_SANCIO as string,
		COD_P_SANCIO_FERME as string,
		COD_LOCALIZACIO_JURIDICA as string,
		COD_ESTAT as string,
		DESC_ESTAT as string,
		COD_DNI_DENUNCIANT as string,
		DESC_NOM_DENUNCIANT as string,
		COD_DEMARCACIO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ODSExpedientTSA
source(output(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		DATA_TRAMITADOR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CertificatDescobert
source(output(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		CODI_TIPUS_PAGAMENT as string,
		DATA_PAGAMENT as date,
		IND_IMPORT_PAGAMENT as string,
		IND_IMPOST_DIPOSIT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Pagament
source(output(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		CODI_DENUNCIA as string,
		DATA_DENUNCIA as date,
		NUM_H_BUTLLETI as string,
		NUM_PK_BUTLLETI as string,
		DESC_AD_BUTLLETI as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Bulletins
source(output(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Devolucions
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		DATA_PROPOSTA_RESOLUCIO as date,
		COD_PRECEPTE as string,
		DATA_RESOLUCIO as date,
		IND_IMPORT_RESOLUCIO as string,
		COD_GRAVETAT_RESOLUCIO as string,
		COD_TIPUS_RESOLUCIO as string,
		COD_TIPUS_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		DATA_REGISTRE_SORTIDA as date,
		DATA_NOTIFICACIO as date,
		DATA_ARRIBADA_NOTIFICACIO as date,
		COD_TANOT as string,
		COD_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		COD_TRAMNOT as string,
		DATA_PRESENTACIO as date,
		COD_TIPUS_RECURS as string,
		DATA_INF_RA as date,
		DESC_IMPRE_REC as string,
		COD_DEMARCACIO as string,
		DESC_GRAVETAT_RESOLUCIO as string,
		DESC_TIPUS_RESOLUCIO as string,
		IND_IMPORT_RESOLUCIO_EUROS as decimal(10,2),
		NUM_ORDRE as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Resolucions
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		DATA_PROPOSTA_RESOLUCIO as date,
		COD_PRECEPTE as string,
		DATA_RESOLUCIO as date,
		IND_IMPORT_RESOLUCIO as string,
		COD_GRAVETAT_RESOLUCIO as string,
		COD_TIPUS_RESOLUCIO as string,
		COD_TIPUS_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		DATA_REGISTRE_SORTIDA as date,
		DATA_NOTIFICACIO as date,
		DATA_ARRIBADA_NOTIFICACIO as date,
		COD_TANOT as string,
		COD_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		COD_TRAMNOT as string,
		DATA_PRESENTACIO as date,
		COD_TIPUS_RECURS as string,
		DATA_INF_RA as date,
		DESC_IMPRE_REC as string,
		COD_DEMARCACIO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Notificacions
source(output(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		CODI_BAREM as string,
		CODI_PRE_BAREM as string,
		CODI_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		CODI_PERCEPTE_SANCIONADOR as string,
		CODI_TIPUS_QUALIFICACIO as string,
		ID_TIPUS_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		NUM_IMPORT_QUA as string,
		DESC_BAREM as string,
		DESC_GRAVETAT_BAREM as string,
		DESC_TANOT as string,
		DATA_QUALIFICACIO as date,
		DATA_NOTIFICACIO as date,
		DATA_PLEC_DESCARREC as date,
		DATA_REGISTRE_SORTIDA as date,
		DATA_CADUCITAT as date,
		NUM_IMPORT_EUROS as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Qualif
source(output(
		CODI_DENUNCIA as string,
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		COD_TIPUS_DENUNCIA as string,
		DESC_EXTRACTE as string,
		DATA_DENUNCIA as date,
		DATA_INSPECCIO as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DenunVolun
source(output(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		COD_DEMARCACIO as string,
		COD_TIPUS_RECURS as string,
		COD_TIPUS_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		COD_NOTIFICACIO as string,
		COD_PRECEPTE as string,
		COD_TRAMNOT as string,
		COD_TANOT as string,
		IND_IMPORT_RECURS as string,
		IND_IMPORT_RECURS_EUROS as decimal(10,2),
		DESC_TIPUS_RECURS as string,
		DATA_RESOLUCIO as date,
		DATA_RECUR as date,
		DATA_PRESENTACIO as date,
		DATA_ARRIBADA_NOTIFICACIO as date,
		DATA_NOTIFICACIO_RECURS as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Recurs
ECB derive(FLAG_RESOL = iif(isNull(DistinctsResol@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_RECURS = iif(isNull(DistinctsRecurs@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_NOTIF = iif(isNull(DistinctsNotifCaducat@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_DESCOBERT = iif(isNull(DistinctCertificat@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_PAGAMENT = iif(isNull(DistinctPagament@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_BULLETINS = iif(isNull(DistinctsBulletins@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_DEVOLUCIONS = iif(isNull(DistinctsDevolucions@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_QUALIF = iif(isNull(DistinctsQualif@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		FLAG_DENUN_VOL = iif(isNull(DistinctsDenunVol@CODI_EXPEDIENT), 0, 1),
		NUM_IMPORT_EUROS = toInteger(IND_IMPORT_SANCIO)/166.386,
		RUTA = iif(COD_DEMARCACIO=='43', 
    '\\\\C.FTX.GENCAT.CAT\\315$\\' + ECB + '\\Sancions\\MB00255_Expedients Sancionadors\\MB00255_' + toString(year(DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT)) + '\\' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,1,2) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,3,5) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,8,2),
   iif(COD_DEMARCACIO=='08',
        '\\\\C.FTX.GENCAT.CAT\\315$\\T030350\\Seccio_Inspeccio_i_Sancions_STT_BCN\\Expedients_Digitals\\G0918_Expedients_sancionadors\\'+toString(year(DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT))+'\\'+substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,1,2) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,3,5) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,8,2), 
        iif(COD_DEMARCACIO=='17',
        'X:\\T030440\\147_Seccio_Inspeccio_i_Regim_Sancionador\\G0831_Procediment_sancionador\\MB0254_Expedients_sancionadors\\'+toString(year(DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT))+'\\'+substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,1,2) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,3,5) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,8,2), 
            iif(COD_DEMARCACIO=='25',
            '\\\\C.FTX.GENCAT.CAT\\315$\\T030840\\Sancions\\ADMINISTRACIO_ELECTRONICA\\G0918_EXPEDIENTS_SANCIONADORS\\G0918_'+toString(year(DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT))+'\\'+substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,1,2) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,3,5) + '-' + substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,8,2), 
            'DemarcaciÃ³ desconeguda')))
    ),
		DATA_PRESCRIPCIO = addDays(DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT,365),
		DATA_ANY_CODI_EXPEDIENT = substring(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,-2,2)) ~> AddsColumns
AddsColumns select(mapColumn(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT = ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
		DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT,
		ID_TIPUS_EXPEDIENT,
		COD_PROP_EXPE,
		DATA_ARXIU,
		COD_ARXIU,
		DATA_SANCIO_FERME,
		NUM_IMPORT_EUROS,
		IND_IMPORT_SANCIO,
		COD_P_SANCIO_FERME,
		COD_LOCALIZACIO_JURIDICA,
		COD_ESTAT,
		DESC_ESTAT,
		COD_DNI_DENUNCIANT,
		DESC_NOM_DENUNCIANT,
		COD_DEMARCACIO,
		FLAG_NOTIF,
		FLAG_RESOL,
		FLAG_RECURS,
		FLAG_PAGAMENT,
		FLAG_DESCOBERT,
		FLAG_BULLETINS,
		FLAG_DEVOLUCIONS,
		FLAG_DENUN_VOL,
		FLAG_QUALIF,
		RUTA,
		CODI_DENUNCIA,
		DATA_PRESCRIPCIO,
		DATA_ANY_CODI_EXPEDIENT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelecColumnes
JoinRecur, DistinctsResol join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctsResol@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinResol
JoinResol, DistinctCertificat join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctCertificat@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDescobert
JoinDescobert, DistinctPagament join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctPagament@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPagament
CertificatDescobert aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	COUNT = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctCertificat
Pagament aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	COUNT = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctPagament
ODSExpedientTSA filter(toInteger(substring(CODI_EXPEDIENT,3,1)) != 9 && year(DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT)<2200) ~> FiltroExpedErroneos
JoinDenunVol derive(ECB = iif(COD_DEMARCACIO == '08', 'T030350', iif(COD_DEMARCACIO == '43', 'T030940', iif(COD_DEMARCACIO == '17', 'T030440', iif(COD_DEMARCACIO == '25', 'T030840',''))))) ~> ECB
Bulletins aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT,
		CODI_DENUNCIA),
	count = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctsBulletins
Devolucions aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	count = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctsDevolucions
JoinPagament, DistinctsBulletins join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctsBulletins@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinBulletins
joinBulletins, DistinctsDevolucions join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctsDevolucions@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDevolucions
Qualif aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	count = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctsQualif
DenunVolun aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	count = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctsDenunVol
Resolucions aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	count = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctsResol
JoinDevolucions, DistinctsQualif join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctsQualif@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinQualif
JoinQualif, DistinctsDenunVol join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctsDenunVol@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDenunVol
Notificacions aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	count = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctsNotifCaducat
FiltroExpedErroneos, DistinctsNotifCaducat join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctsNotifCaducat@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinNotifCaducat
JoinNotifCaducat, DistinctsRecurs join(ODSExpedientTSA@CODI_EXPEDIENT == DistinctsRecurs@CODI_EXPEDIENT,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinRecur
Recurs aggregate(groupBy(CODI_EXPEDIENT),
	count = count(CODI_EXPEDIENT)) ~> DistinctsRecurs
SelecColumnes sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CODI_EXPEDIENT as string,
		DATA_EXPEDIENT_OBERT as date,
		ID_TIPUS_EXPEDIENT as string,
		COD_PROP_EXPE as string,
		DATA_ARXIU as date,
		COD_ARXIU as string,
		DATA_SANCIO_FERME as date,
		NUM_IMPORT_EUROS as double,
		IND_IMPORT_SANCIO as string,
		COD_P_SANCIO_FERME as string,
		COD_LOCALIZACIO_JURIDICA as string,
		COD_ESTAT as string,
		DESC_ESTAT as string,
		COD_DNI_DENUNCIANT as string,
		DESC_NOM_DENUNCIANT as string,
		COD_DEMARCACIO as string,
		FLAG_RESOL as integer,
		FLAG_NOTIF as integer,
		FLAG_PAGAMENT as integer,
		FLAG_DESCOBERT as integer,
		FLAG_BULLETINS as integer,
		FLAG_DEVOLUCIONS as integer,
		FLAG_DENUN_VOL as integer,
		FLAG_QUALIF as integer,
		RUTA as string,
		CODI_DENUNCIA as string,
		DATA_PRESCRIPCIO as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ODSExpedient
